segments.text: Now let's talk about your interests and hobbies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I like reading , walking , swimming , hiking and playing basketball
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . These hobbies have indeed enriched my life
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you usually spend your time after work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer to read novels with a cup of tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of books interests you most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You seem to be a man of imagination and logic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To some extent , I regard books as my good companion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If so , you can benefit a lot from them .
segments.speaker: S1
